pr_title: Integrate gradle validation in normal test workflow

timeline.message: Integrate gradle validation in normal test workflow

timeline.bodyText: It should run before any gradle task otherwise it's nonsene
timeline.author: Siedlerchr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -208,3 +208,11 @@ jobs:
           CI: "false" # we pretend to run locally - even if tests fail on the CI, they count towards test coverage
           CODECOV_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.CODECOV_TOKEN }}
           DBMS: "postgresql"
+  # This is https://github.com/marketplace/actions/gradle-wrapper-validation
+  # It ensures that the jar file is from gradle and not by a strange third party.
+  gradlevalidation:

replies.bodyText: They run in parallel as you see below...
replies.author: tobiasdiez

replies.bodyText:
Maybe it's even easier to just include the step before running any Gradle actions,  i.e. first step after checkout uses: gradle/wrapper-validation-action@v1. Dunno how long the task takes, but in that case we are sure that the test action fails which will be valued a lot more than just a parallel task that can be ignored?
But it's ok like that as well.
replies.author: stefan-kolb

replies.bodyText: It's unlikely that we get get a malicious file...
replies.author: koppor
